price: Бас, ғорда уларнинг қулоқларига уриб, бир неча йилга (ухлатиб қўйдик).
arabic: فَضَرَبۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ فِي ٱلۡكَهۡفِ سِنِينَ عَدَدٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faḍarabnā ʿalā ādhānihim fī al-kahfi sinīna ʿadadan
